code:
flowchart TD
    subgraph "Input Data"
        A1[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        A2[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        A3[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    end

    subgraph "Step 1: Load Data"
        B1[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        B2[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        B3[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

        A1 --> B1
        A2 --> B2
        A3 --> B3
    end

    subgraph "Step 2: Coordinate Alignment"
        C1[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        C2{IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic}
        C3[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        C4[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

        B2 --> C1
        C1 --> C2
        C2 -->|Yes| D1
        C2 -->|No| C3
        C3 --> C4
        C4 --> D1
    end

    subgraph "Step 3: Quality Control"
        D1[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        D2[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        D3[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

        D1 --> D2
        D2 --> D3
    end

    subgraph "Step 4: Patch Extraction"
        E1[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        E2[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        E3[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        E4[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        E5[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

        D3 --> E1
        E1 --> E2
        E2 --> E3
        E3 --> E4
        E4 --> E5
    end

    subgraph "Step 5: Spatial Graph"
        F1[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        F2[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        F3[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        F4[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

        E5 --> F1
        F1 --> F2
        F2 --> F3
        F3 --> F4
    end

    subgraph "Step 6: Save Dataset"
        G1[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        G2[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        G3[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        G4[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

        E5 --> G1
        F4 --> G2
        B3 --> G3
        G1 --> G4
        G2 --> G4
        G3 --> G4
    end

    subgraph "Output: Ready for Training"
        H1[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        H2[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        H3[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]

        G4 --> H1
        H1 --> H2
        H2 --> H3
    end

    style A2 fill:#ffe1e1
